/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. Construction cranes can be seen in the distance, indicating ongoing development in the city. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
